name: Priest Beneath
description:
Be a priest, but beneath! With your super minigun made in 2077, break barriers to increase your shooting speed, and survive! Don't forget to hunt down the sprites to get COOOOOoOL buffs!

The game is about an adventure of a valiant priest Samuel in the underground. Through the caverns, he encountered the pillars that were avatars of the demon lord and also magical sprites that could buff his arcane abilities. Press Space to jump to either attack or dodge the pillars, and cooperate with friendy pixies to travel as further as you can!
